passages.title: Beginnings
passages.content:
{E}Hello newborn. Welcome to life. Your first task in life will be to choose what gender you want to be!
{P}Oh no. So scary woOoOooO!

passages.title: Woman
passages.content: {E}This was not a wise choice. Your life just became 1.89* harder. To be able to live your life, you must defeat me in combat.

passages.title: Overgame
passages.content: {E}I'm sorry, but the world does not currently accept women. Please try again at a later time.

passages.title: Breast milk
passages.content:
{N}Congratulations, you were born.
{N}You must choose whether to drink breast milk or not.

passages.title: Band
passages.content:
{N}You lose strength points. Because of this you get bullied at school.
{N}Because of this you are forced to start playing in a band. Here you meet your one friend Peter. Peter is a lovely guy who loves to play.
{E}I know you have homework, but do you want to play Dungeons & Dragons?

passages.title: Football
passages.content:
{N}You gain strength points. Because of this you get really popular at school.
{N}You start playing football and get a ton of friends.
{E}I know you have homework, but do you want to come join us play football?

passages.title: Homework
passages.content:
{E}The door opens to another room. You see a desk with a large, dusty book.
{P}You are now a fish

passages.title: Peter
passages.content:
{E}The door opens to another room. You see a desk with a large, dusty book.
{P}You are now a fish

passages.title: Play football
passages.content:
{E}The door opens to another room. You see a desk with a large, dusty book.
{P}You are now a fish

passages.title: Do homework
passages.content:
{E}The door opens to another room. You see a desk with a large, dusty book.
{P}You are now a fish

passages.title: The book of spells
passages.content: {E}As you open the book, you discover it's full of ancient spells and enchantments. You can feel the power emanating from the pages.

links.text: Close the book and go back
